wikipedia_page.main: Roger Tully (February 3, 1928 – February 26, 2020) was an English dancer and teacher of classical dance.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Tully

response: Marie Rambert had a ballet school and studio there in 1920, and remained there until 1927, when she moved to the Mercury Theatre, Notting Hill Gate, which became the home of the Ballet Rambert until 1987. In the early 1980s, Roger Tully purchased Rambert's late nineteenth-century dance studio in Bedford Gardens.

After the Second world war she settled in London where she held classes in West London and latterly in studios in Scarsdale Villas, and in Eldon Road, Kensington. She became an established and esteemed ballet teacher.Elfrida Eden Fallowfield. The Dancing Débutante: The adventures of a society beauty on and off the stage. London: Mereo Books. 2014.   retrieved 30-01-2019 Among her hundreds of pupils, notable have been Rukmini Devi Arundale, Tamara Tchinarova, Roger Tully, Nadia NerinaRoger Salas, "Obituary of Nadia Nerina, ballerina", El País 10 October 2008 https://elpais.com/diario/2008/10/10/necrologicas/1223589601_850215.html (in Spanish) retrieved 03.02.2019 Pina Bausch.
